title: So, I have a problem
body: There is a problem with logging in game, I get stuck on authentication for some reason. This happened to me 2 months ago, but it passed after not entire week. Im 99% sure it my internet connection's fault, because when I changed to mobile back earlier, everythign was going allright. But now I dont have a possibility to change my connection and I dont want to wait another week. Can you help me fix it, or should I conntact my internet provider? I just want to notice its only happening to League of Legends, other games don't have this problem. [link to screenshot](https://prnt.sc/fw8md0)

replies.body: Our NA Login servers were having a little fit not too long ago, but no worries! I've reached out to some of the techs and they've put out a fix that should take effect for everyone in about 30 min. If you still can't get logged in after that hit me back up!
It works now, I can log into my account. Thanks, I really appreciate your help Riot.
